bibl.title: The Ancient Economy
bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 74 (2002), Bibl. Beilage 4, p. 166.
RATHBONE Dominic, The Ancient Economy and Graeco-Roman Egypt.
Walter SCHEIDEL and Sitta VON REDEN (Edd.), The Ancient Economy = Edinburgh Readings on the Ancient World (Edinburgh, 2002) pp. 155-169.
